languages.text: {n}В оскале демонетки сквозит и ярость, и веселье.{/n} "Думаешь, такую как я можно застать врасплох? За то время, что ты целишься из своей смехотворной пушки, я могу разделать десяток смертных на фарш. Не беспокойся, к бойне, как и к пиру, я готова всегда. В конце концов, одно не так уж сильно отличается от другого".

traits.locale_text: {n}В оскале демонетки сквозит и ярость, и веселье.{/n} "Думаешь, такую как я можно застать врасплох? За то время, что ты целишься из своей смехотворной пушки, я могу разделать десяток смертных на фарш. Не беспокойся, к бойне, как и к пиру, я готова всегда. В конце концов, одно не так уж сильно отличается от другого".

languages.text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

languages.text: {n}欲魔脸上闪过了半喜半怒的笑容。{/n}“莫非你以为，像我这样的人会放下戒备吗？当你还在瞄准你那可笑的大炮时，我早已将几十个凡人化为肉泥了。不要担心，我已经做好了杀戮的准备，也做好了盛宴的准备。毕竟，这两者之间并没有太大区别。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

traits.locale_text: {n}欲魔脸上闪过了半喜半怒的笑容。{/n}“莫非你以为，像我这样的人会放下戒备吗？当你还在瞄准你那可笑的大炮时，我早已将几十个凡人化为肉泥了。不要担心，我已经做好了杀戮的准备，也做好了盛宴的准备。毕竟，这两者之间并没有太大区别。”

languages.text: {n}La diablilla esboza una sonrisa que es mitad alegría y mitad furia.{/n} «¿Crees que es posible sorprender a alguien como yo? Puedo hacer picadillo a veinte mortales en el tiempo que tardas en apuntar ese ridículo cañón tuyo. No te preocupes: estoy tan preparada para una matanza como para un festín. Al fin y al cabo, vienen a ser casi lo mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

Al fin y al cabo, vienen a ser casi lo mismo».

languages.text: {n}デモネットは喜びと怒りの混じった笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「私相手に奇襲が成功するとでも思ったの？あんたがそのバカげた大砲で狙いを定めるまでの間に、私は1ダースの人間を引き裂いて殺すことができる。心配ご無用、屠殺の準備も宴の準備もできているから。結局、どちらも大きな差はないの」
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

traits.locale_text: {n}デモネットは喜びと怒りの混じった笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「私相手に奇襲が成功するとでも思ったの？あんたがそのバカげた大砲で狙いを定めるまでの間に、私は1ダースの人間を引き裂いて殺すことができる。心配ご無用、屠殺の準備も宴の準備もできているから。結局、どちらも大きな差はないの」

languages.text: {n}Die Dämonette grinst halb freudig, halb zornig.{/n} "Ihr glaubt, jemand wie ich könne überrascht werden? Ich kann in der Zeit, die Ihr benötigt, um mit Eurer lächerlichen Kanone auf mich zu zielen, ein Dutzend Sterbliche zu Hackfleisch verarbeiten. Keine Sorge, ich bin ebenso bereit für ein Gemetzel wie für ein Festmahl. Der Unterschied ist schließlich recht gering."
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

Ich kann in der Zeit, die Ihr benötigt, um mit Eurer lächerlichen Kanone auf mich zu zielen, ein Dutzend Sterbliche zu Hackfleisch verarbeiten. Keine Sorge, ich bin ebenso bereit für ein Gemetzel wie für ein Festmahl. Der Unterschied ist schließlich recht gering."

languages.text: {n}La démonette vous adresse un rictus partagé entre la joie et la fureur.{/n} « Vous croyez vraiment que je suis du genre à me laisser prendre au dépourvu ? Le temps que vous ajustiez la mire de votre canon ridicule, je peux hacher menu une dizaine de mortels. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour moi, je suis tout aussi prête à faire un carnage qu'à festoyer. Après tout, l'un n'est pas très différent de l'autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."

languages.text: {n}İblisiçe, yarı neşeli yarı öfkeli bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Benim gibi birinin gafil avlanabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Siz şu sizin aptal topunuzla nişan alana kadar ben on kadar ölümlüyü paramparça etmiş olurum. Endişe etme, ziyafete hazır olduğum kadar katliama da hazırım. Nihayetinde ikisi birbirinden o kadar da farklı şeyler değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette flashes a grin that is part joy and part fury.{/n} "You think someone like me can be taken by surprise? I can turn a dozen mortals into mincemeat in the time it takes you to aim that ridiculous cannon of yours. Do not worry, I am as ready for a slaughter as I am for a feast. After all, one is not so different from the other."
